text: Robert Alford (born November 1, 1988) is an American football cornerback. He is a free agent. He played college football at Southeastern Louisiana. He was drafted by the Atlanta Falcons in the second round of the 2013 NFL Draft. ==Other websites== * Southeastern Louisiana Lions bio * Atlanta Falcons bio Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American football cornerbacks Category:Arizona Cardinals players Category:Atlanta Falcons players
title: Robert Alford (American football)
